attributes.action: Julie dore to stand down has councillor of Sheffield
attributes.additional_details:
Stand down now

Poor leadership

No job growth

High long term youth un-employment

Ignores the people

When a business closes another bookmakers open


What has this women done to make Sheffield a better place since she has been in office  N-O-T-H-I-N-G

Do what is best for Sheffield and stand down from your position

Thanks
